FuncDef:
The undo te srlg all-config command deletes the SRLG configuration from all interfaces on a TE node.
By default, the SRLG configuration is not deleted from any interfaces on a TE node.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the undo te srlg all-config command is run on a TE node, the te srlg configuration is deleted from all interfaces on the node.
Precautions
MPLS TE-related commands apply only to MPLS TE and SR-MPLS TE. However, this command applies to SRv6 TE Policies, besides MPLS TE and SR-MPLS TE.
